page.title: 02DELIVERIES AND REMOVALS
page.content: On Tuesdays and Thursdays the carters go down to the harbour to meet the new cargo boat which is called The Sark Trader.The cargo comes in big yellow containers which are lowered onto the trailers by crane.Tractors then pull the trailers up the harbour hill and goods are delivered to the different shops and homes. Carters also take visitors cases down to the boats. There is another carter but he does not cart food.He collects rubbish from all over the island and when he has a trailer full he goes down to the harbour and dumps the rubbish over the harbour wall into the sea.The rubbish can still be seen at low tide.
